translations.hero_img_alt: Fabián Avendaño training intensely with kettlebells in the gym.
translations.hero_subtitle: Personal and online training tailored to your goals: weight loss, muscle gain and general health.
translations.mondayDesc: We build real power with movements that matter.
translations.tuesdayDesc: We unleash energy and overcome your mental limits.
translations.wednesdayDesc: We strengthen the body with functional movements.
translations.thursdayDesc: Where there is pause, there is power. We connect with the body.
translations.fridayDesc: Each repetition brings you closer to the person you want to be.
translations.saturdayDesc: The environment also trains. Enjoy the movement.
